https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null CBS News footage is used to chronicle the events of the 1991 war between United Nations allies and Iraq, from Saddam Hussein's invasion of Kuwait on August 2, 1990 to its liberation six months later. Desert Triumph: The Complete Story of Operation Desert Storm
